pagesRouteData.title: Web Development
pagesRouteData.desc: How i focused towards web developent

infoArr.title: HTML
infoArr.desc: The World Wide Web's most popular programming language.

details.content: I started learning HTML from w3schools boring stuff with patience and readout all the basics of HTML.
You can relate with exampe of a book to understand easily, when reading a book has a heading and some content in form of paragraphs and images.
Every book without colors and styling is boring to read.
simmilarly CSS is the most importance for every web application to achive how ui will look like.
I started learning from w3school and switched to youtube tutorials and practising basic css styles.
Initially i work on heading, paragraphs, images and then smaller layouts.
Flexbox, Grid layouts are often used in the most projects and it gives me so confidence to writing css.
I am using sass for layouts, reusable css variables, responsiveness, css utilities, animations &  hover effects etc..
sass provides me freedom to generate css with nextjs for a large scale production grade web-application
I love using tailwind css and class based utility css with react and sass
Initialy i start creating clones of bootstrap ui clones but now i have better understanding how to work with Bootsrap

details.headline: ShadCN
details.content: Shadcn & tailwind is just absolutely a god level development for the frontend

details.headline: Customization
details.content: I prefer shadcn over mui because it gives indepedent comp
I have used material ui in few projects where client need to build faster ui with classic loos & user experience
MUI provides a better features, clean ui and faster development process with react projects without writing a lot of css

details.headline: I created frnz-ui
details.content: I need a usefull ui but for react, I made my own react ui library so that simple ui will be easy to use

pagesRouteData.title: Gaming
pagesRouteData.desc: How i started developing games & playing games

details.content: I am not a Coding Keeda, I know my responsibilites towards work is priority. I Love to play games on free time.
Initialy it was hard to learn cocos creator but well being patience I started learning slowly slowly
It is a node based system to add any type of content in the scene
I played a lot of BGMI during lockdown periods on week days and streams my games
My college seniors used to play counter-strike so i participated for the first time with them
I am very pro player and played on many lan events in IIT rourkee & IIT Amethi
I Love the characters and vibes of this games. Even you should try this
I love Sage as it was my first agent but i am not a professional sage
My role is to lead teams and play with minds and entertain audience, I am a initiator & controller mixed
I used to play pc games like farlight so that i can have idea how games works behind the scene

details.headline: GTA 5
details.content: OMG, how i can leave this game which made a lot of careers of many youtubers in INDIA

details.headline: GTA 6
details.content: I am waiting for GTA 6

pagesRouteData.title: Augmented Reality
pagesRouteData.desc: How augmented reality changed my life

infoArr.title: Spark Ar studio
infoArr.desc: Spark Ar studio is an application development platform where you can create various filters & games using javascript & typescript

details.headline: Face mesh Filters
details.content: I can create Instagram face filters, hand tracking filters, gamification

details.headline: Gamification
details.content: I am good in reseach and implement new features which instagram provides

infoArr.title: Lens Studio
infoArr.desc: Lens studio is alternative to spark ar but for snapchat application

details.headline: Lidar filters
details.content: i can create 3d world mesh lidar for lens studio

details.headline: 3d gamification
details.content: I created most of the games on lens studio with 3d simulation

pagesRouteData.title: NextJS
pagesRouteData.desc: NextJS is a full stack framework for building modern, efficient, and scalable web applications using react

details.headline: Server-Side Rendering (SSR)
details.content: It enables faster reload time and better serach optimization for (SEO).

details.headline: Static Site Generation (SSG)
details.content: It enables developer can pre-render pages at build time so that optimaztion can be improved for user experience

details.headline: API Routes
details.content: We can setup easily for dynamic api's routes for incoming Http requests.

details.headline: Customizable CMS
details.content: You have the freedom to customize your own CMS or use our inbuilt CMS.

details.headline: Authentication & Authorization
details.content: With built-in authentication features using next-auth, we can manage users with large amount of data flow for the users.

details.headline: Data Fetching & caching
details.content: NextJS enables to fetch data both client and server side but whenever possible use server site data fetching and caching to deply faster during build time

details.headline: Layout & Responsive Design
details.content: File based app router can helps to manage layouts and components.

details.headline: Tailwind & Sass Support
details.content: I use mixed of Tailwind CSS and SASS for styling. Sass is better for styling responsiveness and tailwind css is good for design layouts and smaller chunks. ultimatly everything will be convertd into CSS.

pagesRouteData.title: ReactJS
pagesRouteData.desc: React is a JavaScript open-source library for building user interfaces created by Facebook.

infoArr.title: How i started working on ReactJS

details.headline: Reusable components
details.content: React allows to create a components & use whenever required with sme changes of props conditions

details.headline: JSX
details.content: Javascript inside HTMl with condtional rendering and modyifying structure of ui

details.headline: Lifecycle methods
details.content: I have worked on reactlifecycles methods in react functional components in useefect hooks

details.headline: React Hooks
details.content: Efficiently working with react hooks like useState, useEffect, useReducer, useMemo, useCallback hooks & creating complex custom hooks

details.headline: Redux & redux toolkit
details.content: I have been worked on redux toolkit to manage state of the component

details.headline: React Query
details.content: When data fetching need to a be a client side component then i use tanstack react query to efficiently fetch the data

pagesRouteData.title: Javascript
pagesRouteData.desc: I am using javascript from last 4 years

details.headline: Basics
details.content: Start from varibles, data type, functions, operators, & string

details.headline: Loops
details.content: for loop, while loop, forEach, Map, filter & reduce, these looping techniques and when to apply.

details.headline: Conditional Logics
details.content: if else, Switch case, ternary opertor these techniques usefull in react

details.headline: Javascript running behaviour in browser
details.content: How javascript start compiling code and create execution context & setTimeout setInterval works

details.headline: Hoisting, closures, functions in deep, recursive functions
String methods
details.content: Length, Slice, substring, charAT, charCodeAT, trim, split, replace, replaceALl

details.headline: Arrays
details.content: Manupulating arrays using loops, map filter, join, push, pop, shift, unsift, splice

details.headline: Objects
details.content: Creating objects, keys/values/entries, object destructing, call, bind , apply,  JSON

details.headline: Combination of both Arrays & Object JSON techniques
details.content: I just love to play  with mixing of array and objects combine to make usefull json to apply complex logics.

pagesRouteData.title: Nestjs
pagesRouteData.desc: I am using Nestjs from last 6 months
